title: Bucket
description:
A blue or green bucket or pail. Used to talk about real or metaphorical buckets.

May be used to talk about bucket lists, kicking the bucket, making baskets in basketball, an abundance of something (like rain or money), and many other contexts.
apple_vendor_description: The bucket emoji on Apple devices is depicted as a sturdy, classic container with a slightly weathered texture and a subtly glossy finish, reflecting Appleâ€™s commitment to realistic object rendering. Its smooth, rounded edges and the way light gently plays off its surface give it a tangible feel, suggesting utility and readiness. Whether used to signify chores, gardening, or a need to 'kick the bucket' in a lighthearted way, this emoji on Apple devices is both functional and visually appealing.
